column1: The Purple Pig////This restaurant has been on my bucket list for years.  Yesterday
column2: (December 30th) I was finally able to check it off my list.  My wife and I stopped-in late afternoon
column3: and luckily only had about a 10 minute wait.  The place is tiny
column4: and tables are shoehorned in.  To that point
column5: if you are a large person and your table is toward the back of the restaurant
column6: you might have an awkward moment getting to your seat.
